message.name: INF_DEFERRED_PROC_FAILED
message.locale: Deferred Recalculation Processing encountered an unrecoverable error.

message.name: INF_DEFERRED_PROC_FAILED_REASON
message.locale: The deferred recalculation processing operation %1s encountered an error, and has instead been queued for batch processing. The details of this error have been written to the system logs, please contact your system administrator.
